summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6102 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, FAUNTLEE HILLS ADDITION DIVISION NO. 1, as established by Ordinance No. 80469, being the alley in the block bounded by West Director Street, West Barton Street, West Henderson Street and 40th Avenue Southwest; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84196, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
